meanings.definition: The act of skiing on water while being towed by a motorboat.
meanings.sent1: Waterskiings can be thrilling on a sunny day.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy waterskiings during summer vacations.
meanings.sent3: The family had a hilarious mishap while attempting waterskiings.
meanings.sent4: Her grace on the water was like a ballet of waterskiings.
meanings.sent5: The sound of waterskiings echoed across the lake.

meanings.sent1: I watched a waterskiings competition last weekend.
